data.message: How can i verify my facebook page??

replies.message: Hi there, Muhammad. If you're an admin of a local business Page, you may be eligible for a gray verification badge, which you'll see in your Page's settings. Learn more: http://on.fb.me/1XyyXvV. If your Page represents a celebrity, public figure, sports team, media or entertainment, you may be eligible for a blue verification badge. To see if your Page is eligible, please fill out this form: http://on.fb.me/1N3JzZq. Thanks. -Kate

i am the admin of my page but in setting page verification option doesn't exist and the other one i want to get blue badge on my page whenever i open the link of your form it says the page is broken etc please fix it asap :')
Thankyou!
Whoa  Facebook you are busted lol
